cells.data: -- replace :: String -> String -> String -> Stringon replace(strNeedle, strNew, strHayStack)	set {dlm, my text item delimiters} to {my text item delimiters, strNeedle}	set xs to text items of strHayStack	set my text item delimiters to strNew	set strReplaced to xs as text	set my text item delimiters to dlm	return strReplacedend replace
